title: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data
code: library(portawaterperu) library(ggplot2) # Provide some example code here portawaterperu |>    #dplyr::filter(stringr::str_starts(divisiones, "AMAZONAS")) |>   #dplyr::group_by(divisiones) |>    #dplyr::summarise(mean = mean(pob_servida)) |>    ggplot(aes(y = pob_servida, color = tipo_gravedad))+   geom_boxplot(outliers = F)+   labs(title = "Population served given different gravity types",        y= "Population") +   theme_classic()

title: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data
text: dataset shared part capstone project Data Science openwashdata. information project explore insights, please visit project page https://ds4owd-001.github.io/project-laurenjudah/ (public available)

title: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data
text: data obtained @SIASAR, information system containing data rural water supply sanitation services. Using SIASAR’s “download data country” tool, available data Peru (10 excel files) downloaded. examining 10 excel files, 5 pertained potable water systems. 5 data sets imported R subsequently empty values unnecessary columns deleted . Finally, 5 data sets combined 1 data frame based community ID. combined, cleaned data set contains data 32 communities.

what: portawaterperu: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data — portawaterperu
title: portawaterperu: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data — portawaterperu
text: Data project obtained @SIASAR, information system containing data rural water supply sanitation services. Using SIASAR's "download data country" tool, available data Peru (10 excel files) downloaded. examining 10 excel files, 5 pertained potable water systems. 5 data sets imported R subsequently empty values unnecessary columns deleted . Finally, 5 data sets combined 1 data frame based community ID. combined, cleaned data set contains data 32 communities.

title: portawaterperu: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data — portawaterperu
portawaterperu: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data — portawaterperu
text: tibble 6 rows 18 variables nombre name community water system ID identification number (unique water system) pais Country data collection divisiones geographic division (region; province; district) latitud latitude district longitud longitude district altitud altitude district ano year water system data collected comunidades community/municipality/town name PSE water service provider pob_servida population number served water service provider viv_servidas household number served water service provider tipo_gravedad community served gravity distribution system? tipo_bombeo community served force/pump distribution system tipo_pozo_manual community served well system (communal collection point / distribution pipes) tipo_agua_lluvia rain water (sure regard relates water system use analysis) agua_epoca_seca dry season water (sure regard relates water system use analysis) agua_epoca_lluvia rainy season water (sure regard relates water system use analysis)
